sentences.sContent: Or you can get a hero or submarine sandwich “to stay” or “to go” from a sandwich shop or deli.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or you can get a hero or submarine sandwich “to stay” or “to go” from a sandwich shop or deli.
sentences.sCn: 你可以上三明治店或者熟食店买一块“英雄”型或者“潜水艇”型大三明 治，你可以“堂吃”，也可以“外卖”。

sentences.sContent: Only the service counters, like seafood and deli, are absent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only the service counters, like seafood and deli, are absent.
sentences.sCn: 只有服务台那边，没有像海鲜和熟食这样的商品。

trans.tranCn: 熟食店；[食品] 熟食品（等于delicatessen）
